Reviews.Title: Panasonic Lumix
Reviews.Author: Helene Klahre
Reviews.Content: LOVE IT! This is my 3rd Lumix camera..only complaint is that after awhile the zoom breaks , happened to my first 2! But I love the camera so I keep replacing them..

ProductInfo.Features:
16.1MP High Sensitivity MOS Sensor
Leica DC 20x Optical Zoom Lens
24-480mm f/3.3-6.4 Lens
3.0" TFT LCD Display
POWER Optical Image Stabilization
Full HD 1080 Video with Dedicated Button
10 Frames per Second Burst Shooting
Manual Exposure Control
Venus Engine Image Processor
18 Pre-defined Scene Modes
ProductInfo.Name: Panasonic Lumix DMC-ZS25 16.1 MP Compact Digital Camera with 40x Intelligent Zoom (Black)
